MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli affecting properties in Four Crosses and the surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:45PM to complete repairs to faulty equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3:45PM. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:00PM on 27th January 2021
